TextBody:
Hello Mohammed,

I will request access on your EPP Server in order to investigate what is filling up the disk space.
Once I have some news, I will get back to you.

Best regards,
Emil

TextBody:
Hello Mohammed,

Please let me know which is the URL that you are using in order to access the EPP UI.
Also, let me know which is the Server ID of the EPP Server, this can be found in System Configuration -> System Licensing. 

Thank you,
Emil

TextBody:
Hello,

Thank you for your email.
Unfortunately we couldn't find a server that is hosted by us with the mentioned IP or server ID, can you please check if the server ID is the same one, maybe even to send us a screenshot of the server ID?
Can it be that the informations from the ticket are not accurate and that the server you are mentioning is not hosted on the Netwrix side?

Best regards,
Alin Anca

Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix - DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
CoSoSys Ltd www.endpointprotector.com
